alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 10:12AM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will be this morning through mid afternoon. Travel will be very difficult during this time. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Forest Lakes 8 to 12 inches Heber-Overgaard 4 to 6 inches Payson 4 to 6 inches Pine-Strawberry 5 to 9 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
